title: c++ 2005 wont install properly? cant get the game to download
body: Install client wont get past installing prereq files. wont configure c++ 2005 and ends there. please help cannot seem to get anything to work

replies.body: The executable file, run *that* as an admin.

It sounds like you're possibly running into a C++ Error 1935 during install. This is commonly caused by a number or C++ and prerequisite files for the platform not being properly installed on your PC. This can typically be resolved by first uninstalling all currently installed versions of Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 Redistributable, then restarting your PC. Ensure all available [windows updates](http://www.update.microsoft.com/) have been installed, then download and install a fresh copy of C++ directly [from Microsoft here](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387).

Let me know if this helps resolve the issue.
did nothing. also reinstalled 2005 c++ and that didnt fix anything.
